channel.title: Eclipse Plugins, Bundles and Products - Eclipse Marketplace

item.title: WireframeSketcher Wireframing Tool
item.description:
Submitted by: 
Peter Severin
Date Created: 
Mon, 2008-11-03 09:15
Date Updated: 
Fri, 2022-09-23 05:06
WireframeSketcher

WireframeSketcher is a rapid wireframing tool that helps quickly create wireframes, mockups and prototypes for desktop, web and mobile applications. It comes both as a plug-in for any Eclipse IDE and a standalone version. With WireframeSketcher users can quickly gather useful feedback from stakeholders, show off their proposals to clients, share their ideas with fellow developers and in the end build better software. Install the 14 days free trial and test it for yourself.

Some of the top features:

  • Extensive library of built-in controls for any type of UI. Stencils for Android, iPhone, iPad apps and more are available.
  • Hand-drawn look for wireframes. Your stakeholders won't be distracted by little details and you can focus on what’s important. Clean look is also available.
  • Create interactive prototypes. Present your prototypes in full-screen mode and click-through to show how the application or website is supposed work. Export your prototypes to clickable, high-quality PDF, or easily share them online in a few clicks.
  • More than 200 wireframing icons. Icons come in vector format, work at any size, can be colored, rotated, and embedded in any text.
  • Use components to create your own reusable bits. Easy inheritance mechanism lets you modify component's instance without breaking the link to its origin.

Download standalone version from our website: http://wireframesketcher.com/download.html.
item.dc:creator: pseverinqw0

item.title: pgCodeKeeper
item.description:
Submitted by: 
Mansur Galiev
Date Created: 
Fri, 2018-05-04 06:16
Date Updated: 
Thu, 2022-09-22 10:05
Technology, LLC

PostgreSQL and SQL Server schema development tool.

  • Comparing database code is made easy with pgCodeKeeper. Compare live DB instances, pg_dump output, as well as pgCodeKeeper projects.
  • Generate migration scripts in a user-friendly interface. You can use both live DB instances and DB dumps as initial data. You can also compare pgCodeKeeper projects — useful when working with versions control systems.
  • pgCodeKeeper is an Eclipse IDE plug-in. The DB code is saved as an Eclipse project, and the project can be tracked under any of the versions control systems supported by Eclipse — Git, SVN, Mercurial, CVS and others.

More info on https://pgcodekeeper.org
item.dc:creator: mgaliev0jc

item.title: Eulumdat Tools plugin
item.description:
Submitted by: 
maarten meijer
Date Created: 
Tue, 2010-05-18 10:57
Date Updated: 
Thu, 2022-09-22 04:58
FOLD Systems
  • Zip, Unzip, verify, manage, view, and edit IES and EULUMDAT files
  • EULUMDAT is the European standard for photometric data used by all major lighting design programs
  • IES is the IESNA standard for photometric data used in USA, Asia, ME and Pacific
  • Verify and calculate LOR, Downward Flux fraction, and Direct Flux Factors
  • Batch Convert IES files to Eulumdat and Eulumdat to IES
  • Free 30 day trial after installation and registration
  • Based on industry standard Eclipse
  • Check many files against configurable rules and lamp designations
  • Support for Absolute Photometry EULUMDAT as used for LED sources
  • Edit data in Source, Luminaire or Lamp Set mode
  • Content Assist for lamp designations in Source view
  • Quick Fix for Rule Violations
  • Copy Luminaire, Lamp Set or C-Gamma data as plain text
  • Product Properties View to see product designation, symmetry, source type, CIE flux distribution and lamp sets instantly
  • Set preferences for rules and checks to perform
  • Export photometric diagrams in a range of configurable formats
  • Export e100lux per square meter tables as text
  • Run on Windows, Linux and Mac Cocoa as Eclipse plugin

Also available as Eclipse RCP application
item.dc:creator: mmeijerbq4

item.title: Eulumdat Tools RCP
item.description:
Submitted by: 
maarten meijer
Date Created: 
Tue, 2007-06-05 09:37
Date Updated: 
Thu, 2022-09-22 04:56
FOLD Systems
  • Zip, Unzip, verify, manage, view, and edit EULUMDAT and IES files
  • EULUMDAT is the European standard for photometric data used by all major lighting design programs
  • IES is the IESNA standard for photometric data used in USA, Asia, ME and Pacific
  • Verify and calculate LOR, Downward Flux fraction, and Direct Flux Factors
  • Batch convert IES files to Eulumdat and Eulumdat to IES
  • Free 30 trial after installation and registration
  • Based on industry standard Eclipse
  • Check many files against configurable rules and lamp designations
  • Support for Absolute Photometry EULUMDAT as used for LED sources
  • Edit data in Source, Luminaire or Lamp Set mode
  • Content Assist for lamp designations in Source view
  • Quick Fix for Rule Violations
  • Copy Luminaire, Lamp Set or C-Gamma data as plain text
  • Product Properties View to see product designation, symmetry, source type, CIE flux distribution and lamp sets instantly
  • Set preferences for rules and checks to perform
  • Export photometric diagrams in a range of configurable formats
  • Export e100lux per square meter tables as text
  • Run on Mac Cocoa as RCP application: 64 bit version only
  • Run on Windows as RCP application: 64 bit version only
  • Run on Linux GTK as RCP application:  64 bit version only
  • Run on Windows, Linux and Mac Cocoa as Eclipse plugin

Also available as Eclipse plugin
item.dc:creator: mmeijerbq4

item.title: IBM Operational Decision Manager for Developers v 8.11.0.0 - Rule Designer
item.description:
Submitted by: 
François Trible
Date Created: 
Thu, 2021-12-09 09:10
Date Updated: 
Wed, 2022-09-21 09:20
IBM

Rule Designer is the Eclipse-based development environment of IBM Operational Decision Manager for Developers, for making rule applications that automate the implementation of business policies. Developers benefit from a short learning curve, and best-of-class power and efficiency for rule applications development.

Rule Designer key features include co-editing and debugging of Java code and rules, auto correction of rules, decision flow control, code-generation wizards, source code control integration, and conflict and redundancy detection.

When used with IBM Operational Decision Manager for Developers, Rule Designer completes a collaborative work environment for developers to automate a company's business policies for in-house or web-based use.

For additional information and support, go to the IBM Operational Decision Manager Developer Center (https://community.ibm.com/community/user/automation/communities/communit...).
item.dc:creator: ftrible
